dialog: Hi Medi, I have some questions about infectious diseases.
Hello! I'm here to answer your questions.
What is the most common way infectious diseases are spread?
Infectious diseases can be spread through direct contact with an infected person, through contact with contaminated objects or surfaces, or through airborne droplets from coughing or sneezing.
How can I prevent getting an infectious disease?
Washing your hands frequently, avoiding close contact with sick people, and getting vaccinated are all effective ways to prevent getting an infectious disease.
What are some common symptoms of infectious diseases?
Symptoms can vary depending on the specific disease, but common symptoms include fever, coughing, sneezing, fatigue, and body aches.
